title: P Craig Russell - The Ring of the Nibelung
description:
'The Ring of the Nibelung'

Dark Horse Maverick, 2000-2001, 484 pages total

Adapted and Illustrated by P Craig Russell

Vol 1 - Issues 1-4 of The Rhinegold, 32 pages each
Vol 2 - Issues 1-3 of The Valkyrie, 36 pages each
Vol 3 - Issues 1-3 of Siegfried, 36 pages each
Vol 4 - Issues 1-4 of Gotterdammerung, 36-64 pages

P Craig Russell's classic, multiple award-winning adaptation of Richard Wagner's opera. Russell himself considers this his greatest work.
